channel.title: Posts on Hungry Foolish

item.title: Hello
item.description: NEVADA CITY — My name is Nathan and nothing brings me more joy than making something useful. Writing code and pushing around pixels on a screen in an attempt to make something of value for others was my story for the past two decades. This continues to be my day job but I’ve recently decided I need a new challenge to ocupy my free time. When I was younger I couldn’t wait to race home and work on side-projects, all involving a screen and a keyboard.
